name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Stuart W. JAY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Jay

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Stuart W. JAY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 18th day of May, 1998, on certification by the Disciplinary Board that the respondent, STUART W. JAY, who was suspended by Order of this Court dated October 9, 1997, for a period of three months, has filed a verified statement showing compliance with all the terms and conditions of the Order of Suspension and Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E., and there being no other outstanding order of suspension or disbarment, STUART W. JAY is hereby reinstated to active status, effective immediately.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
710 A.2d 608
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Stuart W. JAY, Respondent.
No. 356 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 18, 1998.
